* REPORTING ACCIDENTS: The operator of every motor vehicle which is in any manner involved

in an accident within the state, in which any person is killed or injured, or in which damage to the
property of any one person, including himself, in excess of $75.00 is sustained, shall within 5 days
report the matter in writing to the DEPARTMENT OF MOTOR VEHICLES, 6601 RITCHIE HWY., N.E.,
GLEN BURNIE, MARYLAND.

Accident report forms may be obtained from the Department of Motor Vehicles, State and
Local Police Departments.

* REPORTING ACCIDENTS: The operator of every motor vehicle which is in any manner involved

in an accident within the state, in which any person is killed or injured, or in which damage to the
property of any one person, including himself, in excess of $75.00 is sustained, shall within 5 days
report the matter in writing to the DEPARTMENT OF MOTOR VEHICLES, 6601 RITCHIE HWY., N.E.,
GLEN BURNIE, MARYLAND.

Accident report forms may be obtained from the Department of Motor Vehicles, State and
Local Police Departments.
